inclusion.criterion: Recent experience of an acute burn, injury, or surgery meeting the Diagnostic and Statistical Manual(DSM-IV) A1 stressor criterion
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Child's response to the stressor meets Diagnostic and Statistical Manual(DSM-IV) A2 response criterion
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Proficiency in either English or Spanish
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: New onset or marked worsening of a seizure disorder
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has history of acne and mild hirsutism, elevated testosterone levels, gradual enlargement of hands and feet, irregular menstrual cycle, nipple discharge, snoring, headache, facial features of acromegaly, prognathism. Laboratory evaluation reveals IGF-1 of 968 ng/mL and random GH of 19.7 ng/mL.
